parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the head gasket can cause coolant and oil to mix, leading to engine damage, overheating, and potentially a vehicle fire, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: dense smoke and radiator fluid flow from the tailpipe
and the vehicle stalls or loses power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective design of the engine oil pan can cause oil to not drain completely during oil changes, leading to contamination and damage to other engine components, which can result in engine failure and accidents.
symptoms: and the engine seizes up during normal driving conditions.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the harmonic balancer can cause loss of control, steering, and braking, leading to accidents.
symptoms: and all instrument lights come on at once

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch hydraulic system can cause the clutch pedal to stick to the floor, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
and the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine failure can cause the vehicle to stall or lose power, leading to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: or seizes up during normal driving conditions.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering column can cause the vehicle to lose steering control, leading to accidents, injuries, and even fatalities.
symptoms: the steering wheel becomes difficult to turn
the vehicle skids or rolls over.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering rod can cause the vehicle to lose steering control, leading to accidents, injuries, and even fatalities.
symptoms: The steering rod breaks or fails
the vehicle skids or rolls over.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A defective wheel can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents, injuries, and even fatalities.
symptoms: the vehicle skids or rolls over
the vehicle is involved in a collision.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake pedal can cause the vehicle to take longer to stop or fail to stop, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The brake pedal goes all the way to the floor
the brake pedal has to be pumped to get the vehicle to stop
unusual noise occurs when brakes are applied.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature brake wear and warping can cause the vehicle to vibrate or wobble when braking, leading to loss of control or accidents.
symptoms: brakes experience skidding and loss of control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Improper brake adjustment can cause the brakes to lock up, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: accident occurs due to improper brake adjustment.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake failure can cause the vehicle to lose control or fail to stop, leading to accidents or near-misses.
